name: Void (itch) (Gorethumb, Nightma12e, tornado cub)
description:
**** NEED IMMEDIATE ASSISTANCE /// S.S.  RAPTOR UNDER ATTACK......UNKNOWN.............. SE....... MMEDIAT ................ EVER .... AL ....... CAS ........... UALTIES ****

----------------------------------------------------------------------END TRANSMISSION-----------------------------------------------------------------------

S.S. Raptor went dark approximately 33 hours ago.  All communication attempts have failed and we're sending in a scout to investigate the situation and retrieve the ship's recorded log.  It is imperative the ship's data is retrieved as it holds vital data from their recent mission.  Let nothing stand in your way; failure. is. not. an. option. 

Controls:

Arrow Keys - movement

Space to confirm

Team:

Lead Programmer / Terrain Artist - Gorethumb

Music and Sound Design - tornado cub

Lead Designer - Nightmare
